item.title: Data Science and Society: The SciencesPo R Package
item.description: This presentation is part of a coordinated edition seminar, Data Science and Society, organized by IBPAD and Núcleo de Estudos e Pesquisa em Políticas Públicas, Governo e Gestão (NP3-UnB).

item.title: Synthesis of the Survey of Therapeutic Communities in Brazil
item.description: Below are additional resources for those who are interested in getting more information about this survey results. Comunidades terapêuticas e a disputa entre modelos de atenção e cuidado a usuários de droga Comunidades terapêuticas: temas para reflexão.

item.title: When the Winner Comes Third: Simulating Candidates' Winnability With Inaccurate Polls
